channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: First Thing: Trump declaration of Greenland deal framework met with scepticism
item.description: European leaders welcome a reprieve from tariffs but some Danish MPs are concerned that Greenland is being sidelined. Plus, the story of the family wh...

item.description: PM says he hopes focus will now shift to the ‘hard yards’ of maintaining security in the Arctic Andy Burnham may have a new route to parliament after ...

item.title: US politics live: immigration crackdown continues with Democrats set to reject ICE funding bill
item.description: Operations continue in Minnesota and Somali communities are being targeted in Maine Democrats set to vote against ICE bill The Guardian’s Robert Tait ...

item.title: Why Trump is worried datacenters might cost his party an election
item.description: The president wants big tech to pay more for electricity, but he’s curbing renewable projects that could boost supply Donald Trump is worried about da...

item.title: Liz Hurley testifies in Daily Mail case: my home landline was tapped – latest updates
item.description: The actor is the latest to testify in court over a claim that the newspaper misused their private information The claim over the tapping of lines and ...

item.title: Liz Hurley 'crushed' by invasion of privacy, court told
item.description: The actress is one of seven high-profile claimants that allege the publisher of the Daily Mail and Mail on Sunday committed "grave breaches of privacy...

item.title: What we know about Trump's 'framework of future deal' over Greenland
item.description: Denmark and Greenland have made it clear they will not relinquish sovereignty of the world's largest island.

item.title: First asylum seekers moved into former army camp
item.description: The Home Office says 27 people seeking asylum have been housed in the training camp in East Sussex.

item.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
item.description: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.

item.title: MP expected to step down potentially paving way for Burnham's return
item.description: The Greater Manchester MP was suspended from Labour after reports he sent offensive messages in a WhatsApp Group
